con:testCase.name: BadCases-DEV-CAMT054-CREDIT-Pain001-CheckSum-Wrong
con:testCase.con:description: Tests camts054 credit files with wrong msisdn check sum

con:configuration.query: SELECT * FROM (Select C.ID, C.TOPUP_ID, C.END_TO_END_ID, C.REMITTANCE_INFORMATION From CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY C Where C.DRC_STATUS!='CREDIT_FAILED' Order By C.ID DESC) WHERE RowNum<5

con:request.name: _GUI-Service-paybackCamt054Transaction
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:paybackCamt054Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${_DataSource-GetIDsFromCAMTFiles#ID}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test: Return amount with pain001 file. MSISDN is not assignable.</comment>\r </v1:paybackCamt054Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT * From (SELECT ID, Content FROM SEPA_FILE_CONTENT ORDER BY ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
